_meanings:
{@--1@} A pinnacle, turret, 
projection (on columns or gates); {#vita#}
{#rdiniryUhaviwaMkanIqaH#} <ls>Śi. 3. 55</ls> (where
<ls>Malli.</ls> renders {#niMryUha#} by  
{#mattavAraRAKyaupASrayaH#} and quotes <ls>Vaijayantī</ls>; 
perhaps it was so called from its 
resemblance to the shape of an 
elephant in rut); {#cArutoraRaniryUhA#} <ls>Rām.</ls>
{@--3@} A peg projecting from a wall.

{@--4@} Wood placed in a wall for
pigeons to build their nests or to
perch upon.
